value:
{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07535v1", "title": "The v-numbers of Stanley-Reisner ideals from the viewpoint of Alexander
  dual complexes", "summary": "We express the v-number of the Stanley-Reisner ideal in terms of its
Alexander dual complex and prove that the v-number of a cover ideal is just two
less than the initial degree of the its syzygy module. We give some relation
between the v-number of the Stanley-Reisner ideal and the Serre-depth of the
quotient ring of the second symbolic power of the Stanley-Reisner ideal of its
Alexander dual. We also show that the v-number of the Stanley-Reisner ideal of
a 2-pure simplicial complex is equal to the dimension of its Stanley-Reisner
ring.", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC", "published": "2025-04-10T08:01:59Z"}
